item.title: Boca Raton small plane crash kills 3 and injures 1, authorities say
item.description: A Cessna 310 carrying three people departed Boca Raton and was bound for Tallahassee before it crashed, the FAA said.

item.description: Markets react to the latest escalation in the U.S. and China trade war; CBS' Gayle King prepares for journey to space on Monday.
